description: Dialog title for deleting a user account
Message displayed in error notification when an operation fails unexpectedly
defaultMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again and contact {supportEmail} if the condition persists.

description: Confirmation for the user to know what will happen when they remove their account
defaultMessage: Are you sure? This will remove your account and log you out of the app.

description: Link text for the privacy policy
Title for user settings area for user privacy settings
Page title for the user's privacy information
Description text to tell the user why they should review the privacy policy
defaultMessage: Please review our {ppLink} to learn how {appName} uses and stores your information.

description: Title for area instructing how to request data from Check
Description of what the app will do when the user requests their information
defaultMessage: Request a file with the content and data you created and generated on {appName} by contacting {privacyEmail}.

description: Help text to tell the user how they can request a change to their privacy settings
defaultMessage: Request {appName} to stop processing your information under certain conditions by contacting {privacyEmail}.

description: Title for social accounts connected to their app account
Page title for the user to delete their account
Text to tell the user what will happen to their personal information when their account is removed
defaultMessage: If you delete your account, your personal information will be erased. Comments, annotations, and workspace activity will become pseudonymous and remain on {appName}.

description: Button text for the user to delete their account
